text: Michael Ilan Yoel "Mikey" Federmann (born 9 September 1943, Haifa) is an Israeli businessman and entrepreneur, owner of the Israeli conglomerate Federmann Enterprises. He is Chairman of the Board at Dan Hotels Ltd. He has served as CEO or Director at several companies and organizations, including Eurofund L.P, Elbit Systems Ltd, the Hebrew University of Jerusalem.Israel's 10 richest men and womenBusiness Leaders Biography Michael Federmannjewish Michael FedermannMichael Federmann November 2020, Forbes estimates Federmann's net worth to be $2.1 billion. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Israeli businesspeople
title: Michael Federmann
